CustomField.formula: OR( ISBLANK( Phone ) , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Private_Party", OR(ISBLANK( PersonMailingStreet ) , ISBLANK( PersonMailingCity ) , ISBLANK( PersonMailingState ) , ISBLANK( PersonMailingCountry ) , ISBLANK( PersonMailingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( datasan__Mailing_Address_DPID__pc )), OR(ISBLANK( BillingStreet ) , ISBLANK( BillingCity ) , ISBLANK( BillingState ) , ISBLANK( BillingCountry ) , ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( datasan__Billing_Address_DPID__c ))) , ISBLANK( AccountNumber ) , ISBLANK( Registered_Name__c ) , ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__c ), CONTAINS( Name , "And"), CONTAINS( Name, "t/as"))
